response.original_title: The Praise Baby Collection: Born to Worship
response.overview: The Praise Baby Collection is worship music that provides a nurturing environment for your baby's spirit and mind. Born to Worship includes lullabye versions of "Step By Step", "Here I Am to Worship", "We Bow Down", and more. Songs Listing: Step by Step; Here I am To Worship; Come, Now is the Time to Worship; Made to Praise; A Simple Prayer; You Alone; We Bow Down; Lord Most High; Oh How I Love Jesus; Come Thou Fount of Every Blessings; Jesus, I am Resting Resting; Born to Worship '
response.tagline: Music for Baby's Spirit and Mind
response.title: The Praise Baby Collection: Born to Worship
